## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G42690](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G42690)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AGAP1</u>
- **Gene Name:** ACYLATED GALACTOLIPID- ASSOCIATED PHOSPHOLIPASE 1
- **Description:**   alpha/beta-Hydrolases superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2041599
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
